---
title: "Experiments"
---

- Experiments are empirical procedures that arbitrate competing models or hypotheses.
- An experimental design documents a series of related experiments across varying factors. 
- A design includes the application of one or more method protocols and may also include instruments.

Examples:

- A/B Test
- ML experiment
- Optimization
